com.googlecode.gmail4j.test
Class TestConfigurer

java.lang.Object
  com.googlecode.gmail4j.test.TestConfigurer

public class TestConfigurer
extends java.lang.Object

Test configurer.

Reads src/test/resources/test.properties and uses them for unit testing Gmail4J. Missing properties are queried in during execution with modal dialogs.

Version:
$Id: TestConfigurer.java 38 2009-07-09 17:46:37Z tomas.varaneckas $
Author:
Tomas Varaneckas <tomas.varaneckas@gmail.com>
